Text: Wow, thanks! This would have taken ages to download one at a time. 2524 files. Let's say 30 seconds of clicking and file naming per file. That's 2524/2/60 = 21 hours. Thanks again! :). Now I can download them to my Asus Transformer tablet and watch them without an internet connection.

New version with more updated videos, read the last comment on :
http://code.google.com/p/khanacademy/issues/detail?id=191
